channel.title: SoC2015 on Haiku Project
channel.description: Recent content in SoC2015 on Haiku Project

item.title: Haiku at VALS' second Semester of Code
item.description: The Haiku project is participating again in this year's "Semester of Code" (SoC) of the European VALS project. The SoC is similar to Google's GSoC, but without the financial incentive and more emphasis on the educational side. This is the second installment of "SoC", the objective is still the same: Its goal is to connect higher education students with open source projects to introduce them to the cooperative nature of working within a group on a bigger project.
